atk-s0403a39:2_0: 1-5. Sattakanipātassa paṭhame anavaññattikāmoti abhiññātabhāvakāmo. Tatiye yoniso
atk-s0403a39:2_1: vicine dhammanti upāyena catusaccadhammaṁ vicināti. Paññāyatthaṁ vipassatīti sahavipassanāya
atk-s0403a39:2_2: maggapaññāya saccadhammaṁ vipassati. Pajjotassevāti dīpasseva. Vimokkho hoti cetasoti
atk-s0403a39:2_3: tassa imehi balehi samannāgatassa khīṇāsavassa dīpanibbānaṁ viya carimakacittassa
atk-s0403a39:2_4: vatthārammaṇehi vimokkho hoti, gataṭṭhānaṁ na paññāyati. Catutthe saddho hotītiādīni
atk-s0403a39:2_5: pañcakanipāte vaṇṇitāneva. Pañcame dhanānīti adāliddiyakaraṇaṭṭhena dhanāni.
atk-s0403a39:4_0: 7. Sattame uggo rājamahāmattoti pasenadikosalassa mahāamacco. Upasaṅkamīti bhuttapātarāso
atk-s0403a39:4_1: upasaṅkami. Aḍḍhoti nidhānagatena dhanena aḍḍho. Migārorohaṇeyyoti rohaṇaseṭṭhino
atk-s0403a39:4_2: nattāraṁ migāraseṭṭhiṁ sandhāyevamāha. Mahaddhanoti vaḷañjanadhanena mahaddhano.
atk-s0403a39:4_3: Mahābhogoti upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍassa mahantatāya mahābhogo. Hiraññassāti suvaṇṇasseva.
atk-s0403a39:4_4: Suvaṇṇāmeva hissa koṭisaṅkhyaṁ ahosi. Rūpiyassāti sesassa taṭṭakasarakaattharaṇapāvuraṇādino
atk-s0403a39:6: 8. Aṭṭhame anunayasaṁyojananti kāmarāgasaṁyojanaṁ. Sabbāneva cetāni bandhanaṭṭhena saṁyojanānīti veditabbāni. Imasmiṁ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṁ. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
